title: The Lil Gotit Interview: Lil Keed’s Death, YSL Rico, Weight Gain, Bhad Bhabie & More
description:
Shoutout to our Partners over at Beatopia. Beatopia is the first Beats subscription website for rappers and singers. Full mp3, wav, & stem file downlaods for a low monthly rate . Sign up with our Special Deal at Beatopia.com and use code nojumper for $1 for your first month! 

Beatopia is also giving away an AKG C414 XLII Microphone. Click the link for entry
https://sdqk.me/l/qwYDhtw5

-----
Lil Gotit came through with his fire energy to chop it up with Adam about Keed, YSL, Bhad Bhabie, rappers spending money on girls and more! 

00:00 Intro
5:34 Gotit watches p__ to learn new ways
6:33 Gotit is shocked how much p__ there is on Twitter
7:51 Gotit says he's turned on by Glorilla, he likes hood girls
8:55 "My sh** is 'GD' all the way, never gave a 'BD' "
9:53 Keed's health 
10:48 Gotit is tryna lose weight, hasn't taken any dr*gs in 2 years
13:21 Beatopia
14:31 Gotit was with Keed when he passed, he took him to the hospital
17:00 Gotit says God put him in this situation so he can spend his last moments with him 
19:15 Gotit didn't cry for 2 weeks, until he broke down until he saw him on open casket
20:00 Gotit and Keed almost had their own language
21:14 Gotit says Keed's presence is with him all the times especially when he's in the studio 
23:53 Gotit hasn't been in LA since Keed's passing until today
30:42 Rico case
31:42 Talking on the phone with Thug a lot, seemsto be in good spirit
32:52 Gotit doesn't care about fake Youtube documentary videos about YSL
36:50 Gotit didn't like No Jumper posting about his gaining weight 
42:11 Gotit says he DID NOT date Bhad Bhabie, still cool with her 
44:56 Says he fux with Trippie and Coi despite the Trippie diss
48:00 Rappers should stop spending money on girls 
52:41 There might be a posthumous Keed album

-----
